attributes.action: Investigate the only guaranteed and inexpensive way of improving public health.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Which is to change the energy environment people live and work in that can’t be seen or heard as partially recommended in the None ionizing radiation directive of the  ECC at  http://www.hse.gov.uk/radiation/nonionising/electro.htm for the workplace, but not in homes where people spend more time.
